name: Crazy Cavey
overview: Game description: Crazy Cavey is single-screen platform game, where you play as a caveman collecting keys and avoiding all kinds of ghosts and monsters. The goal is to get to the exit after having successfully collected all keys. Beware of green platforms, that will vanish when you stand on them and platforms with "glue" written on it, as you will get stuck for a few seconds on them.
